title: Bridgedale womens Everyday - Merino Endurance Liner Socks
features: 45% Merino Wool, 9% Nylon / Polyamide, 45% Endurofil / Polypropylene,1% LYCRA / Elastane
MOISTURE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM | Bridgedale’s unique Moisture Management System utilizes technical innovations to transfer moisture away from the skin to keep your feet feeling warm, dry and comfortable.
MERINO WOOL | Knit with MERINO WOOL for superb softness next to skin while providing excellent thermal and moisture control properties.
ENDUROFIL | Combined with Enduro-Wool and Merino Wool for superb wicking and durability. ENDUROFIL is a polypropylene fiber, which also offers high abrasion and wash resistance.
LYCRA | An elastic fiber, which ensures Bridgedale socks fit and stay fitted. Lycra fiber helps Bridgedale socks keep their shape year after year. Lycra fiber is also knit in specific zones
FLAT TOE SEAM | An almost invisible hand linked toe seam closes the toe boxes creating a comfortable, flat seam that doesn't create excess bulk and cause irritation.
description: Lightweight sock for everyday use or as a liner under other Bridgedale socks. Knit with MERINO WOOL for superb softness next to skin while providing excellent thermal and moisture control properties. Bridgedale’s unique Moisture Management System utilizes technical innovations to transfer moisture away from the skin to keep your feet feeling warm, dry and comfortable. Made with ENDUROFIL, that is combined with Enduro-Wool and Merino Wool for superb wicking and durability. ENDUROFIL is a polypropylene fiber, which also offers high abrasion and wash resistance. LYCRA fiber Is used in every sock in the Bridgedale range. It is an elastic fiber, which ensures Bridgedale socks fit and stay fitted. Lycra fiber helps Bridgedale socks keep their shape year after year. Lycra fiber is also knit in specific zones to further improve fit and long term comfort. This is a boot height sock with no cushioning for a slim fit. These versatile socks are perfect, at home, at work or on an expedition. These socks offer all the technical benefits of our high performance yarns, delivering the best socks you can wear everyday.
